benchmark_details.name: SymbolBench
benchmark_details.overview: SymbolBench is a comprehensive benchmark designed to assess symbolic reasoning over real-world time series across three tasks: multivariate symbolic regression, Boolean network inference, and causal discovery.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the symbolic reasoning capabilities of LLMs over time series data.

data.source: Real-world time series data curated from various domains including biology, physics, and healthcare.
data.annotation: Each sample is accompanied by variable descriptions and task-specific ground truths.

methodology.calculation: Metrics such as F1 Score are calculated using standard formulas based on predicted and true outcomes.
methodology.interpretation: Performance is interpreted based on task-specific metrics and benchmarks.
methodology.baseline_results: Various standard baseline models including traditional symbolic regression methods.
methodology.validation: Each evaluation task is validated through in-distribution and out-of-distribution setups to assess robustness.
